snippet: An inquiry by the Federal Bureau of Investigation will examine spending over the past three years by Thomas W. Galante, including a renovation to his office that cost a reported $140,000.
abstract: Inquiry by Federal Bureau of Investigation, federal prosecutors and New York City's Department of Investigation will examine spending over past three years by Queens library system director Thomas W Galante, including renovation to his office that cost reported $140,000.
lead_paragraph: An inquiry by the Federal Bureau of Investigation will examine spending over the past three years by Thomas W. Galante, including a renovation to his office that cost a reported $140,000.

headline.main: Officials Investigating Spending by Director of Queens Library
headline.print_headline: Officials Investigating Spending by Director of Queens Library
